channel.title: Fifa 08 installing problems
channel.description:
Well, Ive downloaded fifa 08 but it won't install. I get the error "please insert cd/dvd 1". Ive never had that error before when installing a game. Have you guys ever had such an error? And what did you do about it. Don't say that I need a crack, because I have this problem with installing the game, not playing it.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Fifa 08 installing problems
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

I used a newsserver to download it, and its the Fairlight version. Thing is, other people didn’t have problems with it.

Well I’m not really sure, your best bet would to be to scrap it and just download a better version from a torrent. You could however download a NO-CD crack and try having that running while installing.

Read full topic

@davidude36 wrote:
